result.arabic_text: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ حَكِيمٌ
result.translation: Iyo hataba impano z’Imana Allah n’impuhwe zayo kuri mwebwe abemeramana, mu gushinga ingingo yo kwahukana kw’abubakanye bagirizanya ubusambanyi mu gihe barahiye, umubeshi muri bo yari guhanishwa igihano yisabiye mu kurahira, ivyo rero biri ukwo kuko Imana Allah ari Nyenukwumvirabigaya, Yumvira abayitakambira mu biremwa, Intungane mu vyo Ikora.
